channel.title: Fixed. Mods, lock and delete. BTW, thank you omgilikepie!
channel.description: In phonescape, the edited version of pimpscape (I think), I just cant seem to get the safe zones to work. I would switch the source, but Ive done too much to the server to switch. I dont want to have to add a 100% realistic castle wars again, and dueling, lol. Can someone PLEASE help me out!! People are taking advantage of the non safe zones, that I cant figure out how to make safe, and are using them to kill new players when no staff are on. Please help!![br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 06:33:59 PM[/size][hr]Can no one help me??[br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2007, 06:58:31 PM[/size][hr]Please someone help, I only have an hour left on my computer. Plz.

item.title: Fixed. Mods, lock and delete. BTW, thank you omgilikepie!
item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:2, topic:141169”] ________ .This corner
| |
| |
| |
. |________|
And this corner.

get the x and y coords for the top right corner. and the x and y coords for the bottom left corner. and then search for “public boolean nonWild” in your client. ok now you should see something like thisif((absX >= 3248 && absX <= 3262 && absY >= 3441 && absY <=3429 ) ||

make a new one after all of them you see that says (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)||
and then fill in the x’s and y’s of the spot you want to be safe and your done. hope i helped.[/quote]
hehe nice tut…

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed. Mods, lock and delete. BTW, thank you omgilikepie!
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

ok lol, your making that way to hard on yourself now i want you to delete all of those that you showed me in that last post. and i want you to replace it with this

(absX >= 2882 && absX <= 2904 && absY >=3526  && absY <=3544 ) ||

i just tried it out on my server and it said this player can not be attacked. so let me know if you have any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed. Mods, lock and delete. BTW, thank you omgilikepie!
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Its in the one place that the warriors guild is in now in RS2. Its that one place with the bar right infront of the castle that the games room ocuppies, lol. Its the area in between the tents. here is the coords-
(absX >= 2882 && absX <= 2889 && absY >= 3535 && absY <=3538) || (absX >= 2889 && absX <=2898 && absY >= 3538 && absY <=3532 ) || (absX >=2900 && absX <=2902 && absY >=3539 && absY <=3530 ) || (absX >= 2895 && absX <= 2899 && absY >= 3529 && absY <=3527 ) ||
lol, help me if you can. Isnt it weird how were both helping each other back and forth, but were the only ones doing it? lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed. Mods, lock and delete. BTW, thank you omgilikepie!
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:2, topic:141169”] ________ .This corner
| |
| |
| |
. |________|
And this corner.

get the x and y coords for the top right corner. and the x and y coords for the bottom left corner. and then search for “public boolean nonWild” in your client. ok now you should see something like thisif((absX >= 3248 && absX <= 3262 && absY >= 3441 && absY <=3429 ) ||

make a new one after all of them you see that says (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)||
and then fill in the x’s and y’s of the spot you want to be safe and your done. hope i helped.[/quote]
Ty, i get that part, but the thing is, the safe zones just dont want to work… I think its because the safe zones need to be alot smaller, because I looked at the safe zone thing for wildy, and The box is only like 3x and 4y long… I dont want to have to make them THAT short. Im thinking of rewriting the whole nonwild void tree, to see what I can do.

Read full topic
